author: Richard Bach
message: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
title: Thought of the day

author: David Jordan
message: Wisdom is knowing what to do next; Skill is knowing how ot do it, and Virtue is doing it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: Bad things are not the worst things that can happen to us. Nothing is the worst thing that can happen to us!
title: Thought of the day

author: Alan Watts
message: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
title: Thought of the day
